FRESH LOCAL
SUPPLIERS

Here at Anna Mae’s, we truly try our best to use local food suppliers when possible. We take pride in using local growers to provide the delicious food that we serve to you, our guests.  There are many reasons to buy local. We believe that supporting our local producers is a great start to sustaining and growing our local economy. In return we are also providing you with top quality, fresh tasting food.

LOCAL
SUPPLIERS

Tomatoes – Connie “The Tomato Lady” Exteter
Meats – Stemmler Meats, Heidelberg, ONÂ

Peaches – Zehr’s Country Market, Millbank ON
Honey – Nith River Apairies, Baden, ON
Apples – Martin’s Family Fruit Farm
Pumpkins – Herrle’s Market, St.Agatha, ON
Cabbage – Millbank, ON
Milk – Festival Dairy, Stratford, ON
Cheese – Millbank Cheese, Millbank, ON
Homemade Aprons – Wellesley, ON
Corn on the Cob, Beets, Beans – Your Farm Market, Woodstock, ON
